T02D1921:297b-4: mchog tu dga' ba rnam par smin //
T02D1921:297b-5: dga' bral rnam par nyed pa ste //
T02D1921:297b-6: lhan skyes mtshan nyid bral ba'o //
T02D1921:297b-7: rnam pa sna tshogs sna tshogs brjod ;
T02D1921:297b-9: rnam par smin pa de las bzlog / bde ba'i ye shes nyer longs spyod //
T02D1921:297b-10: rnam par nges pa grogs su brjod //
T02D1921:297b-11: bdag gis bde ba zos pa'o //
T02D1921:297b-12: mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan //
T02D1921:297b-13: chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs //
T02D1921:297b-14: des na 'di skad du gsungs te //
T02D1921:297b-15: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02D1921:297b-16: dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te //
T02D1921:297b-17: gsum po spangs pas 'di nyid na //
T02D1921:297b-18: lhan cig skyes pa rtogs par brjod //
T02D1921:297b-19: ces dbang bskur ba thob pa ni bya ba byas pa'o zhes brjod de /
T02D1921:297b-20: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bur bcas //
T02D1921:297b-21: bdag gis gson pa 'gras bu ste //
T02D1921:297b-22: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyis //
T02D1921:297b-23: bdag ni da ltar sangs rgyas sras //
T02D1921:297b-24: gzhan yang 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs
T02D1921:297b-25: pa'i bkas dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa
T02D1921:297b-26: dang / dbang bskur ba so so la bla ma'i don du gos gsum dang yon dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1921:297b-27: ma 'byor bar gyur na dang po dang bar ma dang tha mar ro //
T02D1921:297b-28: thams cad du 'byor par ma gyur pa'i phyogs la ni /
T02D1921:297b-29: kun phyogs gcig tu byas te /
T02D1921:297b-30: thog ma nyid du gos gsum dang yon gyi bar du dbul bar bya'o//
T02D1921:297b-31: yang ma 'byor na ji ltar gang yang rung ba ste /
T02D1921:297b-33: ras bal 'jam po'i stan mthon po dang /
T02D1921:297b-34: gser gyi sor gdub nges par dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1921:297b-35: de bzhin du sbyin sreg dang rab tu gnas pa la yang ngo zhes pa'o //
T02D1921:297b-37: sbyin sreg bya zhing gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1921:297b-38: 'gro mchog rnams kyang gdul bya zhing //
T02D1921:297b-39: de rjes dge 'dun chos ston bya //
T02D1921:297b-40: mgon med phongs pa tshim par bya'o //
T02D1921:297b-41: zhes 'di dag thams cad kyi rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i lag par bya'o //
T02D1921:297b-43: rdo rje sor ni brgyad nas brtsams //
T02D1921:297b-44: nyi shu rtsa gnyis grangs mnyam bya //
T02D1921:298a-2: gser dang ra gan sogs 'byung ba'o //
T02D1921:298a-3: rdo rje zhes bya rnam pa gsum //
T02D1921:298a-4: rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu pa'o //
T02D1921:298a-5: yang na rnam pa gnyis dbye ste //
T02D1921:298a-6: zhi dang ma zhi'i dbye bas so //
T02D1921:298a-7: bzhi pa sna tshogs rdo rje ni //
T02D1921:298a-8: rtse mo lnga pa gdong bzhi pa'o //
T02D1921:298a-9: dbus ma gzung ba'i gnas yin te //
T02D1921:298a-10: mtha' yi rtse mo de yi tshad //
T02D1921:298a-11: chu srin spel ba mtha' dang mthar //
T02D1921:298a-12: chu srin kha nas byung ba'o //
T02D1921:298a-13: kha sbom rtse mo bags kyis phra //
T02D1921:298a-14: rtse mo rgu zhing rim gyis rno //
T02D1921:298a-15: phyogs kyi cha las ma 'das pa //
T02D1921:298a-16: dbus ma'i rva ni nas kyi dbyibs //
T02D1921:298a-17: rva bzhi yi ni bar dag kyang //
T02D1921:298a-18: dbus kyi rva dang bar mtshams bya //
T02D1921:298a-19: rdo rje dang ni rjes mthun par //
T02D1921:298a-20: chung du gor gnyis cha bskyed bri //
T02D1921:298a-21: rtse mo phan tshun mnyam bya zhing //
T02D1921:298a-22: dbus ma la ni cung zad bsnyung //
T02D1921:298a-23: rva brgyad rtsa ba'i yan lag tu //
T02D1921:298a-24: padma'i kha khyer ska rags btags //
T02D1921:298a-25: dbus kyi cha ni cung zad tsam //
T02D1921:298a-26: ska rags las ni lhag par bya ;
T02D1921:298a-27: / phan tshun mnyam pa'i lhag ma ni //
T02D1921:298a-28: rim gyis nyis 'gyur mthon por bya //
T02D1921:298a-29: chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad mdzes pa'i //
T02D1921:298a-30: kha ni rtsa bar phreng ba gnyis //
T02D1921:298a-31: zhes pa ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1921:298a-32: dril bu'i drug cha kun nas zhal //
T02D1921:298a-33: de la cha bzhi dag pa yi //
T02D1921:298a-34: khar ba'i rang bzhin las ni bya //
T02D1921:298a-35: gzhan ni gzhan las bsgrub pa yin //
T02D1921:298a-36: dril bu de'i ni nang gi khar //
T02D1921:298a-37: zheng dang chu ru mnyam par bya //
T02D1921:298a-38: kha khyer autpala brgyad cha yin //
T02D1921:298a-39: gzhan la bum pa'i cha dang ni //
T02D1921:298a-40: steng gi cha ni gnyis yin te //
T02D1921:298a-41: ngos su shes rab gdong pa bya //
T02D1921:298a-42: gdong de sngar gyi rdo rje phyed //
T02D1921:298a-43: nyid de rdo rje phyed 'dra bya ;
T02D1921:298a-44: / de ltar sor brgyad la sogs pa'i //
T02D1921:298a-45: dril bu'i rdo rje mthun par sbyar //
T02D1921:298a-46: cung zad chu skyes kha bye ba'i //
T02D1921:298a-47: kha'am yang na kha la mchu //
T02D1921:298a-48: zhes pa ni dril bu'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1921:298a-49: rdul tshon gyi gzhi'i kha dog gi dbye ba brjod pa'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:298a-50: shar du shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1921:298a-51: las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis //
T02D1921:298a-52: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ji ltar rigs par nyi ma dang /
T02D1921:298a-53: zla ba la sogs pa la gnas pa'o //
T02D1921:298a-54: rdo rje zhes pa ni rtse lnga pa'o //
T02D1921:298a-56: de lta bu la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni rin po che ser po cha dgu pa dang /
T02D1921:298b-0: @298b ral gri ljang gu ste nang gi rim pa'i phyogs rnams su'o //
T02D1921:298b-1: mtshams rnams su ni 'khor lo dang /
T02D1921:298b-5: phyi rol gyi rim pa'i sgo rnams su ni tho ba nag po dang /
T02D1921:298b-9: phyi rol gyi 'phar ma'i grva rnams la yang thod pa rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D1921:298b-10: phyag mtshan kun du zhal dang mtshungs //
T02D1921:298b-11: zhes bya ba ni lha rnams rang nyid kyi zhal
T02D1921:298b-12: gtso bo'i sku mdog dang po'i khru gang tsam zhes
T02D1921:298b-13: pa'i 'og na gnas pa'i rin chen sor gnyis pa
T02D1921:298b-14: dang / rdo rje sor drug pa bor ba ste /
T02D1921:298b-15: yu ba khru gang gi tshad do //
T02D1921:298b-16: de'i steng du yu ba'i steng du gnas pa ste /
T02D1921:298b-17: ska rags kyis bcings pa sor bzhi pa las te
T02D1921:298b-18: steng du dkyil 'khor zhes pa ste gru bzhi pa'o
T02D1921:298b-19: // de dag thams cad kyi tshad ji tsam zhen gsungs pa /
T02D1921:298b-20: sor bzhi pa'i tshad ces pa'o //
T02D1921:298b-21: gting du sor gnyis zhes pa ni sor bzhi pa
T02D1921:298b-22: dang ldan pa la sor gnyis gting du bru ba
T02D1921:298b-23: ste / zheng du sor bzhi pa la gting du sor phyed bor ba bru ba ste /
T02D1921:298b-24: dkyil du ni rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje sor gnyis pa'o zhes pa ste /
T02D1921:298b-26: bcud 'dzag khung bu zhes pa ni dgang gzar gyi mgo bor gnas pa /
T02D1921:298b-27: padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa zheng du sor brgyad pa /
T02D1921:298b-28: zabs su sor gnyis pa'i dbus su rgyar sor bzhi
T02D1921:298b-29: pa brkos par gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa
T02D1921:298b-30: sor bzhi'i tshad kyi dgang gzar la mar 'dzag pa'i
T02D1921:298b-31: don du sor phyed kyi bug pa gang yin pa
T02D1921:298b-32: de ni sor phyed de bcud 'dzag khung bu'o //
T02D1921:298b-33: de lta bu 'di ni khru do pa'i tshad kyi dgang gzar ro //
T02D1921:298b-34: blugs gzar padma'i 'dab 'dra zhes pa ni /
T02D1921:298b-35: blugs gzar khru phyed dang gnyis pa ste /
T02D1921:298b-36: de yang 'og tu rdo rje rtse lnga pa sor
T02D1921:298b-37: gnyis pa de'i 'og tu rin po che sor gcig
T02D1921:298b-38: pa'o // de'i steng du yu ba khru gang pa'o //
T02D1921:298b-39: de'i steng du yang ska rags sor gsum pas nye bar brgyan pa'o //
T02D1921:298b-40: de'i steng du sor drug pa'i tshad kyi padma'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1921:298b-41: rdo rje rtse gsum sor gsum pas blugs gzar ro //
T02D1921:298b-42: rgyud kyi che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i don du
T02D1921:298b-43: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs zhes bya ba la
T02D1921:298b-44: sogs pa ste / gshin rje'i gshed kyi rgyud la
T02D1921:298b-45: brten nas mchod pa dang dad pa tsam gyis zhes
T02D1921:298b-46: sogs pa ste / pa lhag ma'o // de nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1921:298b-47: nag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:299a-1: po mchog gi rgyud dang 'bras bu'i tshul rdo rje
T02D1921:299a-2: sems dpa' nyid kyis mkhyen to zhes pa'i don to
T02D1921:299a-3: // rdo rje'i tshig ces pa ni rdo rje sems
T02D1921:299a-4: dpa'i nges pa'i tshig ste dngos po'i rang bzhin brjod
T02D1921:299a-5: pa ni dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs zhes bya
T02D1921:299a-7: slob mas dkyil 'khor du gsar du 'jug pa'i don
T02D1921:299a-8: du de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste
T02D1921:299a-9: / 'byung ba bzhi'i sa bon zhes pa rlung dang
T02D1921:299a-10: me dang sa dang chu ste 'byung ba chen po'i
T02D1921:299a-11: sa bon yam ram lam bam yi ge rnams kyis
T02D1921:299a-12: / so // 'khor lo bzhi zhes pa ni rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams so //
T02D1921:299a-13: gnas bzhi zhes pa ni rkang pa'i 'og dang /
T02D1921:299a-17: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas rnams su
T02D1921:299a-18: sa bon gyi yi ge brjod pa'i don du rkang
T02D1921:299a-19: pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1921:299a-20: 'khor lo bzhi bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:299a-21: gzhu'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:299a-22: grva gnyis su g-yo ba'i ba dan gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1921:299a-23: gru gsum zhes bya ba ni zur gsum mo //
T02D1921:299a-24: ba ne zhes pa ni me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1921:299a-25: rdo rje can ni 'dzin bzod pa //
T02D1921:299a-26: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ri bo 'dzin par bzod pa'o //
T02D1921:299a-27: rdo rje ri bo de nyid bstan pa'i don du ri rab ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:299a-28: sprin zhes pa ni tshogs rnams so //
T02D1921:299a-29: bsil ba chen po zhes ji skad gsungs pa'i don gsungs pa'o //
T02D1921:299a-30: gangs kyi ri bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gangs kyi ri bo ni kha ba'i'o //
T02D1921:299a-31: 'bebs zhes pa ni lus la 'bebs pa'o //
T02D1921:299a-32: ngag la 'bebs pa'i don gsungs pa /
T02D1921:299a-33: rdo rje snang ba mtha' yas sbyor ba zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1921:299a-34: phebs pa'i slob ma'i lce la yi ge aa dmar
T02D1921:299a-35: po yongs su gyur pa'i nyi ma la hr'i: yig
T02D1921:299a-36: dmar po bltas pa de nyid snang ba mtha' yas
T02D1921:299a-39: de'i tshe snang ba mtha' yas su rdzogs nas so //
T02D1921:299a-40: dri ba'i dam tshig ces pa ni dri zhing zhu ba ste /
T02D1921:299a-41: ji skad du gsungs pa'i 'byung ba bzhi po bsgoms
T02D1921:299a-42: pas rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs las gang yang
T02D1921:299a-43: rung ba'i sems bkug pa gang gi rtags de bstan
T02D1921:299a-44: pa'i don du khru gang zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1921:299a-45: pa'o // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1921:299a-46: rin chen cod pan sor drug pa //
T02D1921:299b-0: zhes bya ba'i bar rtogs par @299b sla zhes pa ste ma bshad do //
T02D1921:299b-1: gnod sbyin mo bsgrub ba'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:299b-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:299b-3: gnod sbyin mo ni bsgrub dus su //
T02D1921:299b-4: zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin mo bsgrub par 'dod
T02D1921:299b-5: pa'i dus su ste sngon mo che zhes lhag ma'o
T02D1921:299b-6: // sa bon ma gsungs pa yang man ngag gi h'um yig las skyes pa'o //
T02D1921:299b-7: de yang gzhal yas khang yongs su rdzogs pa ni gshin rje'i gshed kyi gzhal yas khang bzhin no //
T02D1921:299b-8: 'di dag thams cad ni phyag gnyis pa yin la /
T02D1921:299b-9: tho ba la sogs pa ni phyag drug pa nyid do //
T02D1921:299b-10: sngar gyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni rdul tshon bkye ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1921:299b-11: bzhin te gshin rje'i gshed kyi dkyil 'khor bzhin no //
T02D1921:299b-12: bdag po'i mtshan ma 'dzin zhes pa ni ral gcig ma bzhin thod pa dang gri gug 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1921:299b-14: ral gcig ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas sngags kyi yi ge 'bum cad mi smra bar bzlas te /
T02D1921:299b-15: gang gi tshe gnod sbyin mo bsgrub pa de'i tshe
T02D1921:299b-16: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la ras kha
T02D1921:299b-17: tshar ma bcad pa las gnod sbyin mo bris pa'i
T02D1921:299b-19: de yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D1921:299b-22: 'bras bur bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'am /
T02D1921:299b-24: aa mra'i shing rnams gang yang rung ba'i yal ga
T02D1921:299b-25: lag pa g-yon pas 'dzin cing g-yas pas mchog sbyin
T02D1921:299b-26: pa'o // de'i mdun du me tog dang /
T02D1921:299b-28: bshos gtsang la sogs pa sbyin te /
T02D1921:299b-29: dben pa'i gnas su ral gcig ma'i rnal 'byor dang
T02D1921:299b-30: ldan pas sngags bzlas par byas na nyi ma bdun
T02D1921:299b-32: 'ong bar gyur na dri zhim po'i me tog gi chu mchod yon du sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1921:299b-33: de nas las sgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1921:299b-35: chung ma ste gang yang rung ba nges par smra bar bya'o //
T02D1921:299b-36: de lta bus des tha snyad du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1921:299b-37: gzhan du na gsod par byed ces so //
T02D1921:299b-38: yang na ngag po'i bcu bzhi'am /
T02D1921:299b-39: brgyad pa'i tshes gang yang rung ba la spang leb la sngar bzhin du bri bar byas la /
T02D1921:299b-40: ral gcig ma'i rnal 'byor las snying ga'i sa bon gyis bkug ste /
T02D1921:299b-41: tho ba la sogs pa'i sngags bzhin nye ba nyid du bkug pa dang /
T02D1921:300a-1: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /
T02D1921:300a-2: dbang du byas la skye gnas lag pas bkab la sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T02D1921:300a-3: gzhan du cang mi smra bas so //
T02D1921:300a-4: de nas nyi ma bdun gyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1921:300a-5: 'ongs nas sgrub po'i stobs kyis 'dod par byed cing
T02D1921:300a-6: rtse ba sna tshogs pa yang ston par 'gyur ro
T02D1921:300a-7: // 'jigs pa yang ston par byed do //
T02D1921:300a-8: 'on kyang 'jigs par mi bya zhing smra bar yang mi bya'o //
T02D1921:300a-9: de nas bde blag tu gyur pa'i rjes la dngos
T02D1921:300a-10: grub tu 'gyur zhing rnal 'byor pa gang yin par
T02D1921:300a-11: mngon par 'dod pa de dang rtse bar byed do
T02D1921:300a-12: // de nas kyang ma grub na de'i tshe gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor ram /
T02D1921:300a-13: ral gcig ma'i rnal 'byor gyis rang gi snying ga'i
T02D1921:300a-14: sa bon las rdo rje lcags kyu spros pa dang
T02D1921:300a-15: / lcags kyu rnams kyis skye gnas phug la /
T02D1921:300a-16: zhags pas ske nas bcings te bkug nas ri mo la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1921:300a-17: de'i mgo bo nyid la gshin rje mthar byed bskal
T02D1921:300a-18: pa'i me dang mnyam par bsam par bya zhing 'og
T02D1921:300a-19: nas kyang re phas me'i thab khung ste /
T02D1921:300a-20: de nas nga rgyal dang bcas pas der bkug ste
T02D1921:300a-21: gshin rje gshed po'i sngags pas ral gcig ma'i sngags
T02D1921:300a-22: bzlas par byas nas nges pa nyid du nyi ma
T02D1921:300a-25: pukka s'i ni rab tu bsgrub //
T02D1921:300a-26: ces bya ba la de'i dngos grub ni pukka s'i
T02D1921:300a-27: zhes pa ste de ni snying po 'don par byed
T02D1921:300a-28: pa'o // sku mdog ser mo zhes bya ba ni go sla ste /
T02D1921:300a-29: pu yig gi sa bon las skyes pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1921:300a-30: pukka s'i a'i las zhes bya ba ni snying 'khrug pa'i las so//
T02D1921:300a-32: de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas lce la dza yig
T02D1921:300a-33: dmar po las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsgrub
T02D1921:300a-35: snying kham yig dkar por bsam par bya ste /
T02D1921:300a-36: de nas de'i snying 'od zer de rnams kyis bkug ste /
T02D1921:300a-37: rang gi snying la zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1921:300a-39: tho pa ni g-yas par ro //
T02D1921:300a-42: de yang zhags pa ni de'i ske nas 'ching bar byed do //
T02D1921:300a-43: lcags kyu ni 'gug par byed do //
T02D1921:300a-44: gzhu ni bkang ste snying gi gnas su mda' rdeg par byed do //
T02D1921:300b-0: aom pukka pukka che ge mo'i @300b pukka zhes bya
T02D1921:300b-1: ba 'di ni yi ge 'bum sngon du bsnyen par
T02D1921:300b-2: bya'o // mi snang ba'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:300b-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1921:300b-4: 'jam pa'i rdo rje rab bsgrub pa ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje rab tu grub nas bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1921:300b-5: ser po zhes pa ni rtsa ba'i zhal ser po'o //
T02D1921:300b-7: g-yon pa dag ni dkar po dang sngon po'o //
T02D1921:300b-8: man ngag las ni g-yas pa na ral gri dang /
T02D1921:300b-10: g-yon pa na autpala sngon po dang gzhu dang thod pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1921:300b-11: phyag ces pa ni g-yas pa'i phyag dang po'o /'khor lo la sogs gzhan la dgod //
T02D1921:300b-12: ces bya ba ni phyag gzhan lhag ma rnams su'o //
T02D1921:300b-13: gti mug gshin rje'i gshed la sogs pa bzhin du mtshan ma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1921:300b-14: snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni snying por gyur pa'o //
T02D1921:300b-15: phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:300b-16: mya ngan med 'dab ces bya ba ste /
T02D1921:300b-17: me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i yal 'dab bo //
T02D1921:300b-18: yal ga zhes pa ni byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga'o //
T02D1921:300b-19: dbyig pa zhes pas ni dbyi gu gsum pa'o //
T02D1921:300b-20: 'di rnams kyang phyag gnyis pa'i phyir na gzhan gyis ni sdigs mdzub can no //
T02D1921:300b-21: sku mdog bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:300b-22: ser dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T02D1921:300b-23: thob la sogs pa ni sngar bzhin no //
T02D1921:300b-24: bsgom zhes pa ni 'di lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1921:300b-25: mthong bar mi 'gyur zhes pa la /
T02D1921:300b-26: tsa yig ni bdag nyid snying rje'i dbang gis ston par yang byed do //
T02D1921:300b-27: gang du 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs ston pa de bzhin du le'u 'di yang ngo //
T02D1921:300b-28: le'u bcu bzhi pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1921:300b-30: // / sa bon phu: las yang dag byung //
T02D1921:300b-31: zhes bya ba ni sngar bzhin du gzhal yas khang
T02D1921:300b-32: la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rjes la ste
T02D1921:300b-33: / aa la sogs pa rnams kyis ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02D1921:300b-34: ka la sogs pas ni mnyam pa nyid dang /
T02D1921:300b-35: phu:yig las byung ba'i sprul ni so sor rtog pa dang /
T02D1921:300b-36: sprul gyi snying gar yang yi ge phu:ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1921:300b-37: me long la sogs pa gcig tu gyur na ni
T02D1921:300b-38: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings te
T02D1921:301a-0: / de las skyes pa'i phu: yig ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems @301a * //
T02D1921:301a-2: phyag na sbrul rnams zhes pa ni g-yas pa'i phyag na'o //
T02D1921:301a-3: g-yas pa'i phyag gzhan dag ni ral gri dang ral gri gug 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1921:301a-4: g-yon pa'i phyag gsum du 'khor lo dang /
T02D1921:301a-7: rma bya la ni zhon zhes pa ni rma bya la chibs pa'o //
T02D1921:301a-8: rma bya la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du phyag
T02D1921:301a-9: g-yas pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa
T02D1921:301a-10: / sgro dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:301a-11: sgro ni rma bya'i sgro'i tshogs so //
T02D1921:301a-12: yal ga ni byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga'o //
T02D1921:301a-13: lcags sgrog ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud do //
T02D1921:301a-14: 'di rnams kyi rim pa ji lta bar kha dog dbye ba bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:301a-15: ser dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1921:301a-16: 'di rnams kyi phyag mtshan ji skad gsungs pa'i bar
T02D1921:301a-17: du nas phyag gzhan rnams su yang gti mug gshin
T02D1921:301a-18: rje'i gshed la sogs pa bzhin du phyag mtshan rnams
T02D1921:301a-19: so // me tog la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni sngar bzhin du phyag gnyis pa nyid do //
T02D1921:301a-20: de ltar bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1921:301a-21: chu'i dkyil 'khor du lam yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1921:301a-22: dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ser po bsgom par bya'o
T02D1921:301a-23: // ku ru kulle yang rdo rje'i rab dang rdo
T02D1921:301a-24: rje'i gur bskyed pa'i mthar thams cad snga ma bzhin
T02D1921:301a-25: // no ; / khyad par ni mngon par byang chub pa lnga ste /
T02D1921:301a-26: sa bon las autpala ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin la /
T02D1921:301a-27: de'i lte bar zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon
T02D1921:301a-28: las spros pa dang bsdus pa ni bya ba grub
T02D1921:301a-29: pa dang / thams cad ro gcig tu gyur pa
T02D1921:301a-30: ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings
T02D1921:301a-31: pa dang / so // de las byung ba'i hr'i: yig ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1921:301a-32: phyag brgyad du ni klu dgod de //
T02D1921:301a-33: zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i phyag bzhir mtha' yas dang /
T02D1921:301a-36: dung skyong rnams rim pa ji lta bar autpala sngon po ltar sngo bsangs dang /
T02D1921:301a-40: g-yon par phyag bzhir ni padma dang /
T02D1921:301a-43: padma chen po rnams rim pa ji lta bar dkar po dang /
T02D1921:301a-46: dkar bsangs kyi mdog rnams so //
T02D1921:301a-47: klu 'gugs par byed pa gsungs pa /
T02D1921:301b-0: 'dis ni char 'bebs @301b pa'i nus mthu 'byung ba nyid do //
T02D1921:301b-1: de la man ngag ni 'di yin te /
T02D1921:301b-2: kham phor so ma btang ba la rams kyi khu
T02D1921:301b-3: bas ral gri rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su
T02D1921:301b-4: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la /
T02D1921:301b-5: lte bar ku ru kulle'i sngags bsgrub bya'i klu'i ming dang spel te bri bar bya'o //
T02D1921:301b-6: aom ku ru kulle hri: a'a mo gha n'a ga a'a karsha ya /
T02D1921:301b-11: dbyar zla ra ba la sogs pa'i zla ba gsum
T02D1921:301b-12: la rim pa ji lta bar stobs kyi rgyu dang
T02D1921:301b-13: / dung skyong dang nor bdag rnams te /
T02D1921:301b-14: de ltar brje shing bsgyur bas /
T02D1921:301b-15: zla ba ni rim pa bzhin du klu rnams kyi ming dang spel bar byas la /
T02D1921:301b-16: kham phor so ma btang ba gzhan zhig gis kha
T02D1921:301b-17: sbyar bar bya zhing skud pa ser pos dkri bar
T02D1921:301b-18: bya'o // de ru ku ru kulle dgug pa dang /
T02D1921:301b-21: dbang du byas la yang dag par mchod cing gnang
T02D1921:301b-22: ba mnos nas klus byin gyis brlabs pa chu mig
T02D1921:301b-23: la sogs par bcug na der 'bebs par 'gyur ro
T02D1921:301b-24: // rig pa 'dzin ma dgug pa'i don du rdo rje lus med bstan pa /
T02D1921:301b-25: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:301b-26: dbang du byed ces pa ni phan par byed pa'o //
T02D1921:301b-27: phyag na mda' dang gzhu bsnams zhes bya ba ni
T02D1921:301b-28: g-yas pa dang g-yon gyi phyag dag na mda' dang
T02D1921:301b-29: gzhu 'dzin pa'o // dga' ba la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:301b-30: gzhu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1921:301b-31: sku mdog bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:301b-32: ser po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1921:301b-33: ma 'gags pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D1921:301b-34: rdo rje tsa rtsi ka la sogs pa'i sku mdog yin la /
T02D1921:301b-35: dpyid la sogs pa ni tho ba la sogs pa'i mdog go //
T02D1921:301b-36: 'di dag thams cad kyang phyag gnyis pa'o zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1921:301b-37: gshin rje'i gshed po zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1921:301b-38: dgug pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:301b-39: bud med kyi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:301b-40: bya rog gi gdong gi nang du gnas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1921:301b-41: bsgrub bya bud med kyi skye gnas kyi dbus su gnas pa'o //
T02D1921:301b-42: gzhan yang bdag nyid rdo rje lus med kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan par gyur pas so //
T02D1921:302a-0: rdo rje lus med ces bya ba ni de'i sngags te @302a * //
T02D1921:302a-1: sngags dang lha dag dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1921:302a-4: yi ge si ta'i sngags so //
T02D1921:302a-5: yi ge si ta las yang dag byung //
T02D1921:302a-6: zhes bya ba ni shin tu gsal ba'i 'od zer
T02D1921:302a-7: 'bar ba rnam par spros pa de'i lus thams cad
T02D1921:302a-8: khyab pa'o // myos nas bde ba 'dod ces bya ba ni shin tu bde ba 'dod pa'o /
T02D1921:302a-9: aom gyi yi ge dbyangs dang spel //
T02D1921:302a-10: zhes bya ba ni man ngag gis aom dang hri: yig ni dang por bya ba'o //
T02D1921:302a-11: yi ge sv'a h'a de rjes sbyin //
T02D1921:302a-12: zhes bya ba ni yi ge siddha dbus su sbyin zhing mthar ni sv'a h'a'i sgra sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1921:302a-13: de las ni aom hr'i aa mu ki me ba shi ba bastu siddha sv'a h'a /
T02D1921:302a-14: lan bdun ni nyi ma bdun no //
T02D1921:302a-15: gang du rdo rje lus med kyi sgrub pa'i thabs
T02D1921:302a-16: bstan pa de ni rdo rje lus kyi sgrub pa'i
T02D1921:302a-17: thabs so // le'u bco lnga pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1921:302a-19: // / shes par zhes pa ni mngon du byed pa'o //
T02D1921:302a-20: de'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa ;
T02D1921:302a-21: phyag gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:302a-22: rdo rje phyag tu zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1921:302a-23: go ro tam ni thod pa'o //
T02D1921:302a-24: gzhan la zhes pa ni g-yon par ro //
T02D1921:302a-25: phyag lnga zhes pa ni 'khor lo dang /
T02D1921:302a-30: sa bon h'um las yang dag byung //
T02D1921:302a-31: zhes bya ba ni bdun po rnam par dag pa
T02D1921:302a-32: ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa la sogs pa
T02D1921:302a-33: nas rdo rje sems dpa' zhu pa'i bar du byas
T02D1921:302a-34: nas so // yi dags la gnas zhes pa ni ro'i snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02D1921:302a-35: rab sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni rnam par dag pa las so //
T02D1921:302a-36: sna tshogs gzugs zhes pa ni dkar po dang /
T02D1921:302a-39: sngo bsangs kyi mdog rnams so //
T02D1921:302a-40: yi dags la gnas zhes pa ni ro'i snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02D1921:302a-41: chos kyi 'khor lo ni 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
T02D1921:302a-42: aa shvattha ni byang chub kyi shing ngo //
T02D1921:302a-44: dpag bsam gyi shing ste de rnams kyi 'og tu ni rnal 'byor ma rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D1921:302a-45: rdo rje zhes pa ni rtse lnga pa'o //
T02D1921:302a-46: lha mo zhes pa ni lha mo rnams kyi'o //
T02D1921:302a-47: phyag g-yas cha zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i phyag tu'o //
T02D1921:302a-48: thod pa'i snod ni mi'i snod do //
T02D1921:302a-49: aa bas bya ni g-yon pa'o //
T02D1921:302b-0: yid du @302b 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni spyan
T02D1921:302b-1: dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas so sor sbyar
T02D1921:302b-2: bar bya'o // sgo'i cha zhes pas ni shar phyogs dang /
T02D1921:302b-3: lho phyogs la sogs pa'i sgo rnams so //
T02D1921:302b-4: 'khyil bar bcas zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i'o //
T02D1921:302b-5: las kyi cho ga mthong bas zhes bya ba ni
T02D1921:302b-6: phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi g-yon du kha
T02D1921:302b-7: tv'am ga'o // de la spyan la sogs pa ni dkar po dang /
T02D1921:302b-13: ral gri g-yas pa dag gis 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1921:302b-14: g-yon du ni thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1921:302b-15: gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa ni tho ba dang /
T02D1921:302b-19: g-yon pas ni zhags pa 'dzin zhing sdigs mdzub byed pa'o //
T02D1921:302b-20: de bzhin du ma gsungs kyang ye shes kyi 'khor lo gzhug pa dang /
T02D1921:302b-21: phyag rgya rgyas btab pa yang bya ba'o zhes pas so //
T02D1921:302b-22: 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa nyid kyis dkyil
T02D1921:302b-23: 'khor pa zhes pa yang bskyed pa ste bcom ldan
T02D1921:302b-24: 'das kyi snying ga'i sa bon las so //
T02D1921:302b-25: le'u bcu drug pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1921:302b-27: // / rgyud ni thams cad du bsgom pa rnams dkrugs
T02D1921:302b-28: kyang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par
T02D1921:302b-29: bya ste de bzhin du bshad pa gsungs pa /
T02D1921:302b-30: rnam pa lnga ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:302b-31: de la aa yig la sogs pa dbyangs kyi yi
T02D1921:302b-32: ge bcu drug po nyis 'gyur gyis zla ba me
T02D1921:302b-33: long lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi rnam
T02D1921:302b-34: pa'o // ka la sogs pa dang wa ra ya dang bcas pa lhag ma ste /
T02D1921:302b-35: gsal byed bzhi bcu tham pa nyis 'gyur gyi nyi
T02D1921:302b-36: ma ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te byang
T02D1921:302b-38: sa bon gyi yi ge las mtshan mar skyes shing
T02D1921:302b-39: mtshan ma la yang sa bon zhes pa so sor
T02D1921:302b-40: rtog pa'i ye shes te gsum pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1921:302b-41: de dag las spro ba dang bsdu ba ni bzhi pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1921:302b-42: de la zla ba la sogs pa thams cad zhu
T02D1921:302b-43: ba ro gcig tu gyur pa ni shin tu rnam
T02D1921:302b-44: par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te
T02D1921:302b-45: rnam pa lnga'o // sangs rgyas gzugs ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1921:302b-46: rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni glu bzhis nye
T02D1921:302b-47: bar bskul nas mngon par 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs te
T02D1921:302b-48: gtso bo'o // de nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1921:303a-1: bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:303a-2: tsa rtsi ka sogs zhes bya ba ni sngar gang
T02D1921:303a-3: byams pa la sogs pa bsgom pa de nyid du
T02D1921:303a-4: rtogs par bya ste dkyil 'khor pa rnams ni da
T02D1921:303a-5: dung bskyed par gyur pas so //
T02D1921:303a-6: gang du rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa med pa
T02D1921:303a-7: der ni thams cad sdug bsngal las byung ba'i mtshan
T02D1921:303a-8: ma la gnas pa'i sa bon rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1921:303a-9: ste / gang gi phyir mtshan ma ni rdo rjer
T02D1921:303a-10: brjod la de gang sems dpa' ni sa bon te
T02D1921:303a-11: des na rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1921:303a-12: de la khyad par ni glus bskul ba dang nye
T02D1921:303a-13: bar bral ba nyid de de dag thams cad yongs
T02D1921:303a-14: su gyur pa las skyes pa tsam mo //
T02D1921:303a-15: drug las skyes sogs zhes bya ba ni drug ste sngar bshad zin to //
T02D1921:303a-16: sogs zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dbyangs du ma dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1921:303a-17: langs zhes pa ni bzhengs pa'o //
T02D1921:303a-18: dad sgrol zhes pa ni rje btsun no //
T02D1921:303a-19: snying rje khros pa zhes bya ba ni thugs rje las bskul ba'i khro bo'o //
T02D1921:303a-20: khams gsum zhes bya ba ni srid pa gsum ste /
T02D1921:303a-24: sol zhes pa ni sol bar byed pa'o //
T02D1921:303a-25: de dag ni rdo rje tsa rtsi ka'i'o //
T02D1921:303a-26: bdud 'di dag las zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang lha dang phung po dang /
T02D1921:303a-27: 'chi bdag gi gzugs te bdud bzhi po 'di dag go //
T02D1921:303a-28: rgyal par mdzod ces pa ni pha rol las rgyal ba ste rgyal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1921:303a-29: dad sgrol zhes bya ba ni rgyal rigs so //
T02D1921:303a-32: 'jig rten mgon pos zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa rnams mgron du bos pa'o//
T02D1921:303a-33: stong nyid ni stong pa nyid las te bde ba chen po'i ror mthar phyin pa'o //
T02D1921:303a-34: 'jig rten bsod nams zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyis so //
T02D1921:303a-35: de dag ni rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i'o //
T02D1921:303a-36: ci'i phyir khyod ni gang gi phyir //
T02D1921:303a-37: stong nyid sems zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1921:303a-38: stong pa nyid rnam par sems pa ste /
T02D1921:303a-39: stong pa nyid ni don du'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1921:303a-40: 'jig rten mgon pos zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten rnams bos pa'o //
T02D1921:303a-41: de dag ni rdo rje goo r'i'i'o //
T02D1921:303a-42: gru'i dgos pa bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:303a-43: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:303b-0: thugs rje chags pa'i sems kyis zhu zhing @303b thim
T02D1921:303b-1: pa'i rjes la yang dag par bskul ba dang de'i
T02D1921:303b-2: rjes la skar mda' 'phang ba bzhin byang chub kyi
T02D1921:303b-3: sems zhugs so zhes rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1921:303b-4: byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba ni aom a'a:
T02D1921:303b-5: h'um zhes pa'i yi ge gsum po 'bar ba'i gzugs
T02D1921:303b-6: so // rgyud 'dir bde blag tu rtogs pa'i don
T02D1921:303b-7: du thog mar zhes bya ba ni ngag gi brda
T02D1921:303b-8: ste dang po'i rnal 'byor gyi dang po bstan pa'i
T02D1921:303b-9: don du rdo rje sems dpa'i dang po ste /
T02D1921:303b-10: bdun po rnam par dag pa bla na med pa'i mchod pa nas bzung ste /
T02D1921:303b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' rdzogs pa'i mthar thug pa ste rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1921:303b-12: de'i rgyu mthun zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems
T02D1921:303b-13: dpa' de nyid zhu ba las yang dag par bskul
T02D1921:303b-14: bas langs pa'i lha ste 'bras bu gshin rje gshed
T02D1921:303b-15: do // 'khor lo thams cad ces bya ba ni
T02D1921:303b-16: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs so
T02D1921:303b-17: do // // sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid ces bya ba ni /
T02D1921:303b-18: sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1921:303b-19: de dag gi don ni 'di yin te /
T02D1921:303b-20: sgrub thabs legs par brjod par bya'o //
T02D1921:303b-21: rang gi snying gar yam yig dmar po las byung
T02D1921:303b-22: ba'i nyi ma dmar po de la gnas pa'i h'um
T02D1921:303b-23: yig nag po las 'od zer rnams phyung ste /
T02D1921:303b-25: lcags kyu'i rnam pa gnyis su gyur pas /
T02D1921:303b-26: gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang
T02D1921:303b-27: 'dra bar bsgom par bya ba'i 'og nas phug cing
T02D1921:303b-29: mdun du gnas pa la 'od zer rnams drang por bya ste /
T02D1921:303b-30: de dag gi sgo las mchod pa sna tshogs pa rnams sprul zhing phyag bya ba dang /
T02D1921:303b-31: ji srid du bdag gis sdig par gyis pa dang bgyid du stsal ba dang /
T02D1921:303b-32: rjes su yi rang ba'i sdig pa de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi'o //
T02D1921:303b-33: yang bdag gis 'tsho ba'i don du mi bgyid do zhes sdom par bgyid do //
T02D1921:303b-34: gang ji srid bsod nams byas pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1921:303b-35: de nas de ltar mchod pa la sogs pa ji
T02D1921:303b-36: srid bsod nams su gyur pa de dag thams cad
T02D1921:303b-37: 'gro ba rnams kyi don du bla na med pa'i
T02D1921:303b-38: byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
T02D1921:303b-39: byang chub ma thob kyi bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1921:304a-0: de'i rjes la bdag nyid kyis gshin rje gshed kyi rang bzhin du @304a * //
T02D1921:304a-1: sangs rgyas par gyur pa dang /
T02D1921:304a-2: sems can thams cad dpal gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs su rgyas par bya'o //
T02D1921:304a-3: de lta bu'i don gyis bdag nyid gsang sngags chen po 'di nyid yang dag par bsten par bgyi'o //
T02D1921:304a-6: bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D1921:304a-7: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D1921:304a-8: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1921:304a-9: lam bsten pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes pa bdun po
T02D1921:304a-10: rnams yang dag pa'i mchod pa byas la sems can
T02D1921:304a-11: thams cad la bu gcag pa ltar brtse ba'i mtshan
T02D1921:304a-12: nyid can gyi byams pa dang /
T02D1921:304a-14: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las yang dag par spral bar 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi snying rje dang /
T02D1921:304a-15: rnam pa thams cad kyi bde ba yang dag par
T02D1921:304a-16: bsdu bar 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dga' ba
T02D1921:304a-17: dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1921:304a-18: bde ba'i rgyun la 'dod pa'i rnam pa can gyi
T02D1921:304a-19: dang / btang snyoms te / de lta bu'i tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par byas la /
T02D1921:304a-20: 'gro ba rnams rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bur bsam zhing /
T02D1921:304a-21: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa
T02D1921:304a-22: a'atma ko& ham zhes pa'i sngags brjod pas sems nam
T02D1921:304a-24: mdun du re pha las ni nyi ma rnam par bsgom /
T02D1921:304a-25: nyi ma der ni h'um byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste /
T02D1921:304a-26: rdo rje de nyid kyi ni ra ba dang /
T02D1921:304a-27: gur bcangs pa yang rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1921:304a-28: des sa gzhi bcing ba dang /
T02D1921:304a-29: de ni khang pa lta bu ste de'i nang du
T02D1921:304a-30: sna tshogs rdo rje gnas pa'i steng du gnas pa
T02D1921:304a-31: nam mkha'i bdag nyid nam mkha'i phyogs su yam yig
T02D1921:304a-32: nag po las rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po gzhu'i
T02D1921:304a-33: rnam pa gnyis su ba dan g-yo ba gnyis dang
T02D1921:304a-34: ldan pa'o // de'i steng du ram yig dmar po
T02D1921:304a-35: las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum grva rnams
T02D1921:304a-37: de'i steng du bam yig dkar po las chu'i dkyil
T02D1921:304a-38: 'khor dkar po kha 'og tu bltas pa bum pas
T02D1921:304a-39: mtshan pa'o // de'i steng du lam yig ser po
T02D1921:304a-40: las sa'i dkyil 'khor ser ba grva rnams su rdo
T02D1921:304a-41: rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1921:304a-42: de'i thog tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa
T02D1921:304b-0: thams cad yongs su gyur pa las @304b gzhal yas
T02D1921:304b-1: khang rim pa gnyis par sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma'i
T02D1921:304b-2: steng du rang rang gi gnas ji lta bar zla
T02D1921:304b-3: ba dang nyi ma'i gdan rnams so //
T02D1921:304b-4: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1921:304b-5: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan //
T02D1921:304b-6: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1921:304b-7: dra ba dra phyed dril bu dang //
T02D1921:304b-8: ba dan la sogs dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1921:304b-9: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1921:304b-10: nang gi rim pa'i dbus su aa yig la sogs
T02D1921:304b-11: pa dbyangs yig bcu drug pa rnams kyis g-yas skor
T02D1921:304b-12: dang g-yon skor gyi nyis 'gyur las zla ba'i dkyil
T02D1921:304b-13: 'khor ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rnam
T02D1921:304b-14: par dag pa'o // de'i steng du ka yig la
T02D1921:304b-15: sogs pa gsal byed rnams las lhag par da dha
T02D1921:304b-16: wa ya ra la'i yi ge rnams kyi nyis 'gyur
T02D1921:304b-17: gyi rim dang rim ma yin pa las nyi ma'i
T02D1921:304b-18: dkyil 'khor ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi
T02D1921:304b-20: de'i steng du h'um yig la de nyid las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o ;
T02D1921:304b-21: / de'i lte ba la yang nyi ma la gnas
T02D1921:304b-22: pa'i h'um yig ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
T02D1921:304b-24: h'um yig de nyid las gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor
T02D1921:304b-25: lo spros pas sems can gyi don byas nas yang
T02D1921:304b-26: snying bor bkug pa ni bya ba grub pa'i ye
T02D1921:304b-27: shes so // de dag thams cad skad cig gis
T02D1921:304b-28: zhu bar gyur pa las dkar bo ni shin tu
T02D1921:304b-29: rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
T02D1921:304b-31: de ltar na mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa
T02D1921:304b-32: lngas rdo rje sems dpa' 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gshin
T02D1921:304b-33: rje gshed kyi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa sku mdog dkar
T02D1921:304b-34: po zhal gsum ni rtsa ba dkar po /
T02D1921:304b-35: g-yas pa nag po g-yon pa dmar po dang ldan pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1921:304b-36: rang snang ba'i rdo rje phag mo'i rnam pa dmar po dang snyoms par zhugs par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1921:304b-38: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i h'um yig
T02D1921:304b-39: gi 'od zer rnams kyis gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil
T02D1921:304b-40: 'khor bkug ste / khar zhugs nas chags pa dang rjes su chags pas zhu bar bya ste /
T02D1921:304b-41: rdo rje'i lam nas lha mo'i padma'i nang du spros pa dang /
T02D1921:304b-42: byang chub kyi sems de dag las skyes pa dkyil
T02D1921:304b-43: 'khor pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnams gnas ji
T02D1921:304b-44: lta ba bzhin du dgod par bya'o//
T02D1921:305a-0: @305a * // de la nang gi rim pa'i shar du ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la kshe yig dkar po dang /
T02D1921:305a-1: lho phyogs su nyi ma la gnas pa'i ma yig ser po dang /
T02D1921:305a-2: nub tu nyi ma la gnas pa'i me yig dmar po dang /
T02D1921:305a-3: byang du yig ljang gu nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02D1921:305a-4: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su ni zla ba'i
T02D1921:305a-5: dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rim pa ji lta ba
T02D1921:305a-6: bzhin du dza sa do ru yi ge rnam pa
T02D1921:305a-11: phyi rol gyi rim pa'i shar dang /
T02D1921:305a-12: lho la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ya tsa ni
T02D1921:305a-13: ra zhes pa'i yi ge bzhi po nyi ma la
T02D1921:305a-18: grva bzhi ru ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D1921:305a-19: pa pa'i na yo ni ra zhes ba'i yi ge
T02D1921:305a-20: bzhi po kha dog dkar por blta bar bya'o //
T02D1921:305a-21: de nas rang gi rig ma dang lhan cig tu chags pa dang /
T02D1921:305a-22: rjes su chags par zhu ba las rdo rje sems dpa' zhu ba'i gzugs su blta bar bya'o //
T02D1921:305a-23: de nas sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyi dbang gis byams pa dang /
T02D1921:305a-26: btang snyoms kyi tsa rtsi ka la sogs pa rnal
T02D1921:305a-27: 'byor ma bzhi po rnams nang gi rim pa'i grva
T02D1921:305a-29: / de la rdo rje tsa rtsi kas ni 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs par byed de /
T02D1921:305a-30: snying rjes khros pa'i rje btsun bzhengs //
T02D1921:305a-31: srid gsum kun gyi gti mug sol //
T02D1921:305a-32: de bzhin rdo rje phag mos kyang ste /
T02D1921:305a-33: rje btsun gsol bas ma zhugs bzhengs //
T02D1921:305a-34: bdud ni dag las rgyal bar mdzod //
T02D1921:305a-35: de bzhin du rdo rje dbyangs can mas kyang /
T02D1921:305a-36: 'jig rten mgon po stong nyid ji ltar bzhugs //
T02D1921:305a-37: rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams kyis bzhengs shig / de bzhin du rdo rje goo r'i sa kyang /
T02D1921:305a-38: byang chub 'dod pa'i 'jig rten mgron pos nas //
T02D1921:305a-39: ci phyir khyod ni stong nyid sems par byed //
T02D1921:305a-40: glu'i de ma thag pa'i rjes nyid du /
T02D1921:305a-41: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa'i yi ge gsum po dmar
T02D1921:305a-42: zhing zhu ba'i tshogs su zhugs par blta bar bya'o
T02D1921:305a-43: // de nas zhu ba de nyid las nyi ma
T02D1921:305a-44: dmar po la gnas pa'i yam yig sngon po las
T02D1921:305a-45: rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa'o //
T02D1921:305b-0: de'i lte bar yang nyi ma dmar bo la gnas pa'i yam yig @305b sngon po'o //
T02D1921:305b-1: de nas sa bon dang bcas pa'i rdo rje yongs
T02D1921:305b-2: su gyur pa las bdag nyid zhe sdang gshin rje
T02D1921:305b-3: gshed gnag cing khrol drag po'i mgo bo'i phreng ba
T02D1921:305b-6: dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D1921:305b-9: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa /
T02D1921:305b-11: 'jig pa'i dus kyi me lta bu /
T02D1921:305b-13: stag gi pags pa rnams dkris pa /
T02D1921:305b-17: g-yon dmar ba phyag drug ste /
T02D1921:305b-18: g-yas pa'i phyag gsum na rdo rje dang /
T02D1921:305b-21: g-yon pa'i phyag gis ni 'khor lo dang /
T02D1921:305b-22: padma dang thod pa 'dzin pa ma he chen po'i rgyab tu nyi ma la zhabs g-yon brkyang ba'o //
T02D1921:305b-23: dbu la sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin gyi thod pa'i
T02D1921:305b-24: dum bu lnga gnas shing phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa'o
T02D1921:305b-25: // ba spu'i bu ga rnams la rang dang 'dra ba'i gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs spro zhing /
T02D1921:305b-26: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1921:305b-27: zhes pa'i sngags brjod par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1921:305b-28: de dag ni rjes su rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1921:305b-29: de'i rjes la nang gi rim pa'i shar phyogs su
T02D1921:305b-30: gnas pa'i kshe yig las gti mug gshin rje gshed
T02D1921:305b-31: dkar bo / rtsa ba'i zhal dkar ba /
T02D1921:305b-34: phyag g-yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang /
T02D1921:305b-37: g-yon pa'i phyag rnams kyis rin po che dang /
T02D1921:305b-39: thod pa'i 'dzin cing aom dzi na dzi ka ces pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o ;
T02D1921:305b-40: / de nas lho phyogs ma yig yongs su gyur
T02D1921:305b-41: pa las phra ma gshin rje gshed sku mdog ser
T02D1921:305b-42: po / rtsa ba'i zhal ser po /
T02D1921:305b-45: g-yas pa'i phyag rnams kyis rin po che dang /
T02D1921:305b-48: g-yon pa'i phyag rnams kyis 'khor lo dang /
T02D1921:305b-50: thod pa 'dzin zhing aom ratna dhrik ces pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D1921:305b-51: de nas nub phyogs su me yig yongs su gyur
T02D1921:305b-52: pa las 'dod chags gshin rje gshed sku mdog dmar
T02D1921:305b-53: po / rtsa ba'i zhal dmar zhing g-yas pa nag po /
T02D1921:306a-1: pa'i phyag rnams su padma dmar po dang /
T02D1921:306a-2: ral gri dang gri gug 'dzin pa /
T02D1921:306a-3: g-yon pa'i phyag rnams su 'khor lo dang /
T02D1921:306a-4: rin po che dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1921:306a-5: aom aa ro lika ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D1921:306a-6: de nas byang phyogs su da yig yongs su gyur
T02D1921:306a-7: pa las phrag dog gshin rje gshed margata'i mdog can
T02D1921:306a-8: / rtsa ba'i zhal ljang gu g-yas pa nag po //
T02D1921:306a-10: g-yas pa'i phyag rnams su ral gri dang /
T02D1921:306a-13: g-yon pa'i phyag rnams kyis 'khor lo dang /
T02D1921:306a-16: aom pra dzny'a dhrik ces pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D1921:306a-17: bzhi po de rnams kyang zhabs g-yon brkyang ba dbu skra ser po gyen du 'greng ba /
T02D1921:306a-18: spyan gsum zlum zhing dmar ba 'jig pa'i dus kyi me ltar bzod par dka' ba'o //
T02D1921:306a-19: de nas nang gi rim pa'i me'i mtshams su gnas
T02D1921:306a-20: pa ni dza yig las rdo rje tsa rtsi ka
T02D1921:306a-21: gti mug gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba /
T02D1921:306a-22: byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin /
T02D1921:306a-23: aom mo h'a ra ti zhes pa'i sngags brjod cing blta bar bya'o //
T02D1921:306a-24: de nas bden bral du sa yig las rdo rje
T02D1921:306a-25: phag mo zhe sdang gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba
T02D1921:306a-26: la / rtsa pa'i zhal phag pa'i gdong can snying rje'i bdag nyid can /
T02D1921:306a-27: aom dve sha r'a ti zhes pa'i sngags brjod cing bsam par bya'o //
T02D1921:306a-28: de nas rlung gi mtshams su do yig las rdo
T02D1921:306a-29: rje dbyangs can ma sku mdog dmar mo 'dod chags
T02D1921:306a-30: gshin rje gshed dang 'dra zhing dga' ba'i bdag nyid
T02D1921:306a-31: can / aom r'a ga r'a ti zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod cing bsam par bya'o //
T02D1921:306a-32: de nas dbang ldan du du yig las rdo rje
T02D1921:306a-33: goo r'i ma phrag dog gshin rje gshed dang mtshungs
T02D1921:306a-34: pa la / ral gri'i gnas su autpala ser po 'dzin pa btang snyoms kyi bdag nyid can /
T02D1921:306a-35: aom badzra r'a ti zhes bya pa'i sngags brjod cing blta bar bya'o //
T02D1921:306a-36: rnal 'byor ma de rnams kyang zhabs g-yas brkyang bas gnas pa'o //
T02D1921:306a-37: de nas phyi rol gyi rim pa'i shar phyogs kyi
T02D1921:306a-38: sgor yam yig las tho ba gshin rje gshed zhe
T02D1921:306a-39: sdang gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba las khyad par
T02D1921:306a-40: ni rdo rje'i gnas su rdo rje rtse gsum pas
T02D1921:306a-41: mtshan pa'i tho ba 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1921:306b-0: aom mudga ra dhrik @306b ces pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D1921:306b-1: de nas lho phyogs kyi sgor tsa yig yongs su
T02D1921:306b-2: gyur pa las dbyig pa gshin rje gshed phra ma
T02D1921:306b-3: gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba las khyad par ni
T02D1921:306b-4: 'khor lo'i gnas su rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan
T02D1921:306b-5: pa'i dbyig pa 'dzin cing aom dandi dhrik ces bya
T02D1921:306b-7: / de nas nub phyogs kyi sgor ni yig yongs
T02D1921:306b-8: su gyur pa las padma gshin rje gshed 'dod chags
T02D1921:306b-9: gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba ste /
T02D1921:306b-10: aom padma dhrik ces bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D1921:306b-11: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgor ra yig yongs su
T02D1921:306b-12: gyur pa las ral gri gshin rje gshed phrag dog
T02D1921:306b-13: gshin rje gshed dang 'dra ba aom khadga dhrik ces
T02D1921:306b-14: pa'i sngags brjod cing bsam par bya'o //
T02D1921:306b-15: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyang 'khor lo'i bdag po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1921:306b-16: de nas phyi rol gyi rim par grva bzhi la
T02D1921:306b-17: gnas pa ni na yo ni r'a'i sa bon las
T02D1921:306b-18: sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i rang gi gdan la
T02D1921:306b-19: thod pa rnam pa bzhi por bdud rtsi rnam pa
T02D1921:306b-20: lngas gang bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D1921:306b-21: de dag ni 'khor lo thams cad rdzogs ba ste /
T02D1921:306b-22: shin tu rnal 'byor du brjod pa'o //
T02D1921:306b-23: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po dang dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi mig la sogs pa la /
T02D1921:306b-28: aom badzra ksha ya zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1921:306b-29: de bzhin du mgo bo la zla bar aom yig dkar po gnas pa dang /
T02D1921:306b-30: mgrin pa a'a: yig dmar po padma dmar po la gnas pa dang /
T02D1921:306b-31: snying gar nyi ma dmar po la gnas pa'i h'um
T02D1921:306b-32: yi ga sngon po sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid
T02D1921:306b-34: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D1921:306b-35: zer gyis nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D1921:306b-36: thams cad la yang dag par mchod nas de bzhin
T02D1921:306b-37: gshegs pa thams cad de bdag la dbang bskur khyed
T02D1921:306b-38: kyis stsol zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1921:306b-39: de nas de rnams kyis gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs su bya ste /
T02D1921:306b-40: bum pa bdud rtsi lngas gang ba bzung ste dbang skur bar byed do //
T02D1921:306b-41: de nas phyi dang nang gi dri ma ma lus
T02D1921:306b-42: ba bkrus te 'bar zhing gsal ba dang ldan pa
T02D1921:306b-43: bdag nyid kyi phyi dang nang gi dri ma ma
T02D1921:307a-0: lus @307a * // pa dag par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1921:307a-1: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po dang dkyil 'khor ba rnams
T02D1921:307a-2: kyi dbu la rang gi rigs kyi bdag por blta
T02D1921:307a-3: bar bya'o // de yang 'di lta sta /
T02D1921:307a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1921:307a-5: gti mug gshin rje gshed kyi rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1921:307a-6: phra ma gshin rje gshed kyi rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1921:307a-7: 'dod chags gshin rje gshed kyi snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02D1921:307a-8: phrag dog gshin rje gshed kyi don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1921:307a-9: rdo rje rtsa rtsi ka ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1921:307a-10: rdo rje phag mo ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1921:307a-11: rdo rje dbyangs can ma ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02D1921:307a-12: rdo rje goo r'i ma'i ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1921:307a-13: thob gshin rje gshed kyi mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1921:307a-14: dbyig ba gshin rje gshed kyi rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1921:307a-15: padma gshin rje gshed kyi snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02D1921:307a-16: ral gri gshin rje gshed kyi don yod grub ba zhes pa'o //
T02D1921:307a-17: de'i rjes la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi
T02D1921:307a-18: 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug ste
T02D1921:307a-23: aom khadga ho: zhes pa'i sngags rnams pa bzhi dgug pa dang /
T02D1921:307a-26: dbang byas pas dam tshig ge 'khor lo dang ye shes kyi 'khor lo gcig tu bya'o //
T02D1921:307a-27: de nas yam yig yongs su kyur pa las ji
T02D1921:307a-28: skad gsungs pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor la de sbar
T02D1921:307a-29: ba'i ram yig yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil
T02D1921:307a-30: 'khor ro // des bsros pa'i aa yig dkar po
T02D1921:307a-31: yongs su gyur pa'i thod pa srog dang bral pa'i
T02D1921:307a-32: go kung ha na aom yig gis byin gyis brlabs
T02D1921:307a-33: pas zhu bar gyur par blta par bya zhing /
T02D1921:307a-34: aom yig gi thig le las byung ba'i 'od zer
T02D1921:307a-35: gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka'i
T02D1921:307a-37: der zhugs pas bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas bsil bar bya ste /
T02D1921:307a-38: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa'i yi ge gsum gyis byin
T02D1921:307a-39: gyis brlab cing lha rnams thams cad kyi zhal du
T02D1921:307a-40: h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i 'od
T02D1921:307a-41: zer gyi spu gus rab tu gzhug par blta bar
T02D1921:307a-42: bya'o // de nas 'khor lo tshim par gyur par
T02D1921:307a-43: blta bar bya zhing rdo rje tsa rtsi ka'i zhal
T02D1921:307a-44: gyi glus mchod bar bya ste /
T02D1921:307a-45: aa kye kye gshin rje gshed nag bla //
T02D1921:307a-46: srin po'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin khyod //
T02D1921:307a-47: bdag gis khyod mthong shin tu 'jigs //
T02D1921:307b-0: @307b khros pa'i rang bzhin 'di thong mdzod //
T02D1921:307b-1: de nas rdo rje phag mo'i zhal nas /
T02D1921:307b-3: khyod kyi gar gyis g-yo bar mdzad //
T02D1921:307b-4: mig sman bdar 'chag khros pa'i thugs //
T02D1921:307b-5: khyod ni ro langs bzhin gar mdzod //
T02D1921:307b-6: de nas rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i zhal nas /
T02D1921:307b-7: mdangs nag tshad ni thung pa la //
T02D1921:307b-8: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs yul mdzad //
T02D1921:307b-9: dbyangs can ma bdag gsol ba 'debs //
T02D1921:307b-10: bde ba chen po khyod gar mdzod //
T02D1921:307b-11: de nas rdo rje goo r'i ma'i zhal nas kyang //
T02D1921:307b-12: hr'i: shatri:'i sngags kyi gar gyis //
T02D1921:307b-13: srid pa gsum gyi 'khrul pa sol //
T02D1921:307b-14: rje btsun snying rje'i dbang gis khros //
T02D1921:307b-15: 'gro bas gar byed pa ni mthong //
T02D1921:307b-16: zhes pa'i glu'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod nas de la bstod pa bya ste /
T02D1921:307b-17: gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D1921:307b-18: gshin rje gshed po shin tu 'jigs //
T02D1921:307b-19: ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
T02D1921:307b-20: rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1921:307b-21: phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D1921:307b-22: gshin rje gshed po shin tu 'jigs //
T02D1921:307b-23: rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa //
T02D1921:307b-24: rdo rje rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1921:307b-25: 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D1921:307b-27: dbyangs kun gyi ni mchog gi mchog / rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1921:307b-28: phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D1921:307b-29: gshin rje gshed po las kun pa'o //
T02D1921:307b-30: rdo rje sku dang rab mtshungs pa //
T02D1921:307b-31: phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1921:307b-32: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod //
T02D1921:307b-33: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
T02D1921:307b-34: sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gi mchog / dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1921:307b-36: de ni rnal 'byor chen po ste //
T02D1921:307b-37: mig sogs byin gyis brlabs pa dang //
T02D1921:307b-38: sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid dang //
T02D1921:307b-39: ye shes 'khor lo gzhug pa dang //
T02D1921:307b-40: bdud rtsi myang ba dag dang ni //
T02D1921:307b-41: mchod pa che dang bstod pa ni //
T02D1921:307b-42: rnal 'byor chen po zhes brjod pa'o //
T02D1921:307b-43: zhes pa 'dis nye bar mtshon par bya ste /
T02D1921:307b-44: 'chad par 'gyur ba skyang rnal 'byor chen por rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1921:307b-45: bdag nyid de ltar bsgoms nas thams cad kyi snying
T02D1921:307b-46: gar rang rang gi stan dang zla ba dang nyi
T02D1921:307b-47: ma la gnas pa'i rang rang gis bon yi ge
T02D1921:308a-2: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D1921:308a-3: aom yakshe ma med ya tsa ni r'a dza sa do ru /
T02D1921:308a-4: na yo ni r'a h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1921:308a-5: de bzhin du lha thams cad kyi sku rnams las
T02D1921:308a-6: rang dang 'dra pa'i lha'i sku sems can gyi don
T02D1921:308a-8: de la zhe sdang gi rigs kyi snod du gyur
T02D1921:308a-9: pa'i sems can rnams btul nas mchod pa chen po
T02D1921:308a-10: zhe sdang che ba la bkod nas 'od zer te
T02D1921:308a-11: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i lus la rab tu zhugs
T02D1921:308a-12: pas zhe sdang gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lor blta
T02D1921:308a-13: bar bya'o // de bzhin du gti mug gi rigs
T02D1921:308a-14: kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can rnams mchod pa
T02D1921:308a-15: chen po gti mug che ba la bkod nas gti
T02D1921:308a-16: mug gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs rnams gti mug gshin
T02D1921:308a-17: rje gshed kyi sku la bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1921:308a-18: de bzhin du phra ma'i rigs kyi snod du gyur
T02D1921:308a-19: pa'i sems can rnams mchod pa chen po phra ma
T02D1921:308a-20: che ba la bkod nas phra ma gshin rje gshed
T02D1921:308a-21: kyi sku lha'i 'khor lo rnams bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1921:308a-22: de bzhin du phrag dog gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams kyang rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1921:308a-23: de ltar yang dang yang du bsgom par byas pas
T02D1921:308a-24: ngal bar gyur na yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor
T02D1921:308a-26: nag dang ser dang de bzhin dmar //
T02D1921:308a-27: sngo bsangs dkar ljang rim pa las //
T02D1921:308a-28: lhan cig skyes dga' tsam du ni //
T02D1921:308a-29: 'khor lo bdag por bcas pa bsgom //
T02D1921:308a-30: de nas langs te snar bzhin du lha'i 'khor lo
T02D1921:308a-31: rnams bgo zhing spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs
T02D1921:308a-33: de ltar lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas gtor ma
T02D1921:308a-34: byin gyis brlab pa dang zhib la gos pa'i las
T02D1921:308a-36: de nas ji ltar bya ba bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:308a-37: slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:308a-38: bde gshegs bka' zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1921:308a-39: ji skad gsungs pa'i gang la gnas pa 'di ni
T02D1921:308a-40: bya ba'o // 'di ni mi bya ba'o //
T02D1921:308a-41: spun zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi spun du
T02D1921:308a-42: gyur pa ste sems can rnams nyid kyi skyon bstan
T02D1921:308a-43: par mi bya'o zhes pa 'brel te /
T02D1921:308a-44: de bzhin khro bar mi bya zhes pa ni khros
T02D1921:308a-45: pa las legs pa'i chos bstan pa ma yin pa'o
T02D1921:308a-46: // bden pa zhes pa ni don dam pa'o //
T02D1921:308a-47: chos zhes pa ni rul ba dang 'gal ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1921:308b-0: chos la tshad ni zhes pa ni @308b zab cing
T02D1921:308b-1: rgya che ba'i lha la sogs pa la ste dgos
T02D1921:308b-2: pa chung du la zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1921:308b-3: rtag tu bsten par bya zhes pa ni lhag ma'o //
T02D1921:308b-4: shes rab rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni shes rab
T02D1921:308b-5: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams kyi'o
T02D1921:308b-6: // slong mos zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa med pas so //
T02D1921:308b-7: rnal 'byor par mi bya zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1921:308b-8: rtag par ni dus thams cad du'o //
T02D1921:308b-9: rtag tu zhes pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
T02D1921:308b-10: sngar dam tshig mngon par brjod pa las yang gang
T02D1921:308b-11: zhig brjod pa ni de'i don yang 'di yin te
T02D1921:308b-12: bsrung ba dang / bza' ba de dag gi dam tshig ni gnyis te /
T02D1921:308b-13: sngar ni bza' ba'i dam tshig brjod pa yin la /
T02D1921:308b-14: 'dir ni bsrung ba'i dam tshig tu dgongs te /
T02D1921:308b-15: bla ma smod pa zhes pa ni gnod pa byed pa'o //
T02D1921:308b-16: de bzhin dam tshig ces bya ba ni dam tshig nyams pa na'o //
T02D1921:308b-17: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1921:308b-18: bde gshegs rnams la zhes pa ni bla ma rnams la zhes pa'o //
T02D1921:308b-19: de dang nye bar ma gyur na sangs rgyas rnams nyid la'o //
T02D1921:308b-20: nyams pa'i gnas skabs su bla ma 'di ji lta bu zhig la bya zhe na gsungs pa //
T02D1921:308b-21: dad pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:308b-22: dam tshig ces bya ba ni go ku da ha nal sogs pa bsten pa'o //
T02D1921:308b-23: gzhan mi rtag ces bya ba ni dam tshig bsten
T02D1921:308b-24: par byed pa ji ltar gzhan gyis mi rigs pa'o
T02D1921:308b-25: // nyes pa ma lus zhes pa ni lung las gsungs pa'i nyes pa gsungs pa'o //
T02D1921:308b-26: bsam gtan la sogs zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1921:308b-27: sems can mchog gzhol zhes ba ni sems can gyi don mchog pa'o //
T02D1921:308b-28: bla ma der ni bla ma zhes bya ba ni bla ma de la gus par bya ba'o //
T02D1921:308b-29: slob ma'i yon tan bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:308b-30: bstan zhes pa ni bstan pa nyan pa dang klog pa'o //
T02D1921:308b-31: dul ba zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad las dman par sems pa'o //
T02D1921:308b-32: dad pa'i bsam pa ni rab tu dang ba'o //
T02D1921:308b-33: mdzes zhes pa ni lus dang yan lag dman pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D1921:308b-34: smin bya zhes pa ni chos bstan pa la sbyor ba'o //
T02D1921:308b-35: mchog tu dga' ba chen po zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1921:309a-0: @309a * // dga' bar gyur zhes pa ni mchog tu tshim par byed pa'o //
T02D1921:309a-1: ched du brjod ces bya ba ni brjod pa dang ldan ba rnams so //
T02D1921:309a-2: ni brjod ce na gsungs pa /
T02D1921:309a-3: gshin rje gshed kyi mthar thug ces pa ni dpal
T02D1921:309a-4: gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud dang lhar dngos grub myur
T02D1921:309a-5: ba gdon mi za bar 'byung ba'i 'khor lo rnams
T02D1921:309a-6: las gzhan dag tu de bzhin du ma yin pas
T02D1921:309a-7: so // thod pa'i mthar thug ces pa ni thod pa 'chad ba'i mthar thug pa ste /
T02D1921:309a-8: he ru ka'i rnal 'byor gyi mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1921:309a-9: de lta bas na nyan thos la sogs pa'i brtul
T02D1921:309a-10: zhugs ni mthar thug pa ma yin no zhes pa'i
T02D1921:309a-11: don to // ae ma'o zhi ba chen po'i chos //
T02D1921:309a-12: zhes bya ba ni rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta
T02D1921:309a-13: bu gnyis med bden par mi 'gyur ba las zhi
T02D1921:309a-14: ba chen por byed pa pos 'jigs par mdzad pa
T02D1921:309a-15: zhes pa ni zhi bar gyur nas gdul bya rnams
T02D1921:309a-16: la rmad du byung pa'i 'jigs pa'i gzugs su ma
T02D1921:309a-17: sprul pa'o // de lta bu'i lha gnyis gsungs pa /
T02D1921:309a-18: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1921:309a-19: 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'o //
T02D1921:309a-20: ae ma'o 'khor ba zhi ba nyid //
T02D1921:309a-21: ces bya ba ni 'di yang 'khor ba lta bu'am /
T02D1921:309a-23: lha rnams kyi rnam pas 'jug pa lta bu la yang rgyun gyis 'jug par byed pa'o //
T02D1921:309a-24: ae ma'o 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:309a-25: nyes pa gang de sha zhes pa ni khyim dang khyim thab dang /
T02D1921:309a-28: de dag ni 'khro pa'i skyon te /
T02D1921:309a-31: byang chub med cing zhes pa ste /
T02D1921:309a-32: 'di yang byang gzhal yas khang du gnas pa la
T02D1921:309a-33: sogs pa yin yang 'ching ba'i rgyu ma yin te
T02D1921:309a-34: / 'on kyang grol ba nyid du byed pa'o //
T02D1921:309a-35: yang skyon rnams yon tan du ji ltar byed ce na gsungs pa /
T02D1921:309a-36: byang chub med cing zhes pa ste /
T02D1921:309a-37: 'di yang byang chub 'di bsgrub par bya ba la /
T02D1921:309a-38: byang chub sems dpa' ni sgrub par byed pa'o zhes logs su mngon par zhen pa med pa'o//
T02D1921:309a-39: mngon rtogs med ces pa ni mngon par rtogs pa
T02D1921:309a-40: ni byang chub kyi don du lam ste der logs
T02D1921:309a-41: su mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //
T02D1921:309a-42: dngos po min zhing bsgom pa min //
T02D1921:309a-43: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba dang /
T02D1921:309a-46: tha dad kyi mngon par zhen pa dang bral zhing
T02D1921:309b-0: @309b sems nyid yang dang yang du goms par byed
T02D1921:309b-2: ci'i phyir yang mngon par zhen pa med ce na gsungs pa /
T02D1921:309b-3: khams kyang min zhen zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:309b-4: phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i rten med pa'o //
T02D1921:309b-5: gzung ba med pas 'dzin pa yang med dam zhe na ;
T02D1921:309b-7: 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa yang med ces pa'i don to //
T02D1921:309b-8: 'o na so sor snang ba 'di ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1921:309b-9: nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs ba nyid //
T02D1921:309b-11: gang gi phyir nam mkha' ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1921:309b-13: dkar po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba snang ba tsam ste /
T02D1921:309b-14: de lta bu yang mun pa dang /
T02D1921:309b-15: sprin la sogs pa'i gzhi yin pa de rnams ba sdus nas nam mkha' nyid ni //
T02D1921:309b-16: 'dir 'di lta bu zhes rmongs pa'i yin can rnams mngon par zhen pa'o //
T02D1921:309b-17: de bzhin du bde pa chen po ro gcig par
T02D1921:309b-18: rtogs pa rnam pa dang bral ba'i shes pa dang
T02D1921:309b-20: de lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzhi yin
T02D1921:309b-21: pas de nyid rang bzhin no zhes rmongs pa rnams
T02D1921:309b-24: nam mkha' lta bu zhes pa ste //
T02D1921:309b-25: bdag med chos 'di bde chen po //
T02D1921:309b-26: zhes bya ba ni sems nyid bde ba chen po'i
T02D1921:309b-27: rang bzhin de nyid bdag med pa'i chos yin la
T02D1921:309b-28: / de yang sna bar 'dod cing rnam pa'i rang bzhin med par gyur pa ste /
T02D1921:309b-29: rang bzhin med pa rnam pa bral ba zhes pa'o //
T02D1921:309b-30: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po med pa de'i
T02D1921:309b-31: phyir na 'byung ba lnga ma grub par bstan pa'i
T02D1921:309b-33: sa yang ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:309b-34: sa la sogs pa ni rdul phra rab kyi tshogs
T02D1921:309b-35: nyid du 'dod cing rdul phra rab kyi cha shas
T02D1921:309b-36: med pa'i dngos po zhes brjod de /
T02D1921:309b-37: 'di ni phyogs kyi cha'i dbye bas rtogs pa gang la cha shas med pa yin /
T02D1921:309b-38: de lta bas na rdul phra rab ma grub pas
T02D1921:309b-39: sa la sogs pa'i bya ba ni snyim pa chu
T02D1921:309b-41: gal te 'di dag thams cad la gzung ba dang /
T02D1921:309b-42: 'dzin pa sna tshogs rang bzhin kyis med na gang las skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1921:309b-44: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:309b-45: rdo rje ni mi byed pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1921:310a-2: de'i rab tu sbyor bas zhes pa ni gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1921:310a-3: bskyed pa ni de las te /
T02D1921:310a-4: 'dir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang por 'di ni blta bar bya /
T02D1921:310a-5: bdag ni lta byed do zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1921:310a-6: de yang ci gzung ba dang 'dzin pa de zhes ba la brten pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T02D1921:310a-8: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:310a-9: dngos po thams cad ces bya ba ni gsal zhing
T02D1921:310a-10: snang ba brten pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam
T02D1921:310a-11: pa'o // dngos med bshad ces pa ni bden pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa'o //
T02D1921:310a-13: shes pa la brten nas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i
T02D1921:310a-14: rang bzhin du rtag pa yang ci pha rol bo'i
T02D1921:310a-15: shes pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1921:310a-16: ma yin te / pha rol gyi rang rig pa mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1921:310a-17: rang gi yang dag par rig pa la brten pa yang ma yin te /
T02D1921:310a-18: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1921:310a-19: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yang mngon du gyur
T02D1921:310a-20: pa ma yin pas na gzung bar ma grub pa
T02D1921:310a-21: nyid do // da ltar byung ba'i rang rig pa
T02D1921:310a-22: yang gcig pa nyid kyis na gzung pa dang 'dzin
T02D1921:310a-23: pa ji ltar yin te bdag nyid la bdag nyid
T02D1921:310a-25: de lta bu nyid kyis na dngos po med pa zhes bya ba la sogs ba ste /
T02D1921:310a-26: ces zhes bya ba ni gang de lta bu de'i don gyis na dngos po med pa ste /
T02D1921:310a-27: shes pa la brten pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin par yang dngos por ma grub pa'o //
T02D1921:310a-28: 'o na 'di lta bu yang ste bden par gyur
T02D1921:310a-29: pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa spang ba'i
T02D1921:310a-30: don du nges pa nyid du thabs goms par byas
T02D1921:310a-31: na de ni gnyen po la ste bden pa'o //
T02D1921:310a-32: de lta bu'i sbyor ba gang la yod pa de ni rnal 'byor pa zhes 'os pa'o //
T02D1921:310a-33: rnam pa gzhan gyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyid do zhe na /
T02D1921:310a-35: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1921:310a-37: rnal 'byor pa'i 'brel pa ni yod pa ste /
T02D1921:310a-38: gzhan yang 'di ni chad pa ma yin te snang ba tsam du yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1921:310a-39: ji skad gsungs pa'i dpyad pa mi bzod pas na rtag pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1921:310a-40: don dam pa yang ma grub na rnam pa gzhan
T02D1921:310a-41: gyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngor rtag pa de
T02D1921:310a-42: ji ltar grub / de ni lha'i rnal 'byor pa
T02D1921:310a-43: yang don 'di gsal bar bya pa'i phyir yan lag
T02D1921:310b-0: med cing @310b zhes pa la sogs pa ste gsal
T02D1921:310b-1: zhing snang ba las yan lag la sogs pa ste
T02D1921:310b-2: ji ltar grub / / des na chad pa yang
T02D1921:310b-3: ma yin zhing ji skad gsungs pa'i dpyad pa mi
T02D1921:310b-4: bzod pas na rtag pa ma yin pas so //
T02D1921:310b-5: ci de lta mod kyi 'o na ni don dam pa gang yin zhe na /
T02D1921:310b-6: gang mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid can no zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1921:310b-7: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yongs su spangs
T02D1921:310b-8: pa gang bde ba chen por ro gcig pa'i ye
T02D1921:310b-9: shes de ni bden pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1921:310b-12: dngos po thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:310b-13: dngos po thams cad ces bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi zhes bya'o //
T02D1921:310b-14: de'i rten ni shes pa'i rnam pa ste /
T02D1921:310b-15: chos can de las chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1921:310b-16: de rnams kyang don dam par ma grub pa'o zhes pa'i dgongs pa bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
T02D1921:310b-17: thog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1921:310b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa de dag
T02D1921:310b-19: bdag gis rtogs par byas nas go bar bya pa'i
T02D1921:310b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:310b-22: de dag gi ci zhig brjod ce na /
T02D1921:310b-23: dri med ces bya ba la sogs pa la dri
T02D1921:310b-24: med ni dri ma med pas te phyi rol gyi
T02D1921:310b-25: gzung ba dang de la ltos pa rnams so //
T02D1921:310b-26: dag pa ni rnam par ngag pa ste /
T02D1921:310b-27: ye shes ni gzugs su gzung ba dang de la
T02D1921:310b-28: ltos pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin par ma byung ba'o
T02D1921:310b-29: // ho zhes pa ni mnyes pa'o //
T02D1921:310b-32: mchog tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:310b-33: mchog ni ma bcos par 'dod pa yin la /
T02D1921:310b-34: dga' ba ni bde ba chen po yin pas so //
T02D1921:310b-35: 'di lta bu yang thabs kyi bsgrub bya bsod nams bden pa'i bdag nyid ma yin no zhe na /
T02D1921:310b-37: bsod nams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:310b-38: bsod nams ni bsod nams kyis so //
T02D1921:310b-39: thob pa zhes pa ni rab tu thob pa'o //
T02D1921:310b-40: ma zhes pa ni ma yin pa'o //
T02D1921:310b-42: de yang thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis phyi rol gyi
T02D1921:310b-43: bsod nams bden pa'i bdag nyid de der byed do
T02D1921:310b-45: thabs kyi ngo bo ni lus su snang ba tsam dang /
T02D1921:310b-46: bsod nams kyi rang bzhin yin pas na yod pa nyid do //
T02D1921:311a-1: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pa na rnam par
T02D1921:311a-2: shes pa tsam 'ba' zhig gis gnas pa yang ma
T02D1921:311a-3: yin pa de ni stong pa nyid tsam du brjod
T02D1921:311a-4: cing snying rje med par 'gyur bas na /
T02D1921:311a-5: de ltar 'di yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis dbyer
T02D1921:311a-6: med du gsungs pa'i don du snying rje'i sems kyis
T02D1921:311a-7: zhes pa ste / snying rje'i sems ni rmi lam
T02D1921:311a-8: dang sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo'o
T02D1921:311a-9: zhes pa ste / // yod ces pa ni ji
T02D1921:311a-10: srid nam mkhar gnas pa'i bar du sems can ma
T02D1921:311a-11: lus pa'i don mdzad pa'i nus pa yod pa'o //
T02D1921:311a-12: dang ba zhes pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yongs su spangs pa ste dri ma med pa'o ;
T02D1921:311a-14: gter chen gcig phus zhes pa la gter chen ni gter chen po dang 'dra ba ste /
T02D1921:311a-15: 'gro ba ma lus pa'i tshor ba ster bas na'o //
T02D1921:311a-16: de bzhin nyid ces pa ni dbyer mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1921:311a-17: stong pa zhes pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i skyon dang bral ba'o //
T02D1921:311a-18: 'o na de lta bu don dam pa byas pas
T02D1921:311a-19: 'gro ba 'di dag rnams la ni skye zhing 'gro
T02D1921:311a-20: ba yin pas de dag gi rang bzhin la ma
T02D1921:311a-23: mchog tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:311a-24: mchog ni 'gro ba la khyab pa'o //
T02D1921:311a-25: dga' ba ni nyon mongs pa dang bral pa'o //
T02D1921:311a-26: de'i phyir 'di nyid dang po zhes pa ste dang po nyid dngos po med pa ste /
T02D1921:311a-27: gcig gi rang bzhin du 'os pa med pas khyab ces pa'i don yin la /
T02D1921:311a-28: de yang gcig gi rang bzhin du nges pa la ni mchog tu dga' ba med do zhes pa'o //
T02D1921:311a-29: dga' ba ni nyon mongs pa dang bral ba yin na /
T02D1921:311a-30: de yang ji ltar shes she na /
T02D1921:311a-32: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:311a-33: bde ba chen po ni rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs
T02D1921:311a-34: pa dang bral ba yin la des na dga' ba
T02D1921:311a-36: de lta bas na 'di ni chos rnams ngo bos zhes pa ste /
T02D1921:311a-37: chos ni rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po ma lus pa'o //
T02D1921:311a-38: de rnams kyi rang bzhin ni gnyug ma'i de kho
T02D1921:311a-39: na nyid de mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyang de rang
T02D1921:311a-40: bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa las so //
T02D1921:311a-41: 'o na 'di ltar 'gro ba ni rkyen la skye
T02D1921:311a-42: ba dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba'i rang bzhin te de
T02D1921:311b-0: dag @311b kyang der 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D1921:311b-2: med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:311b-3: med pa ni med pa nyid do //
T02D1921:311b-5: de bzhin nyid ces pa ni de bzhin nyid la'o //
T02D1921:311b-6: bsod nams med cing sdig pa med //
T02D1921:311b-7: ces pa ni thams cad kyang ro mnyam pa de'i rang bzhin no zhes pa'o //
T02D1921:311b-10: 'jig dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:311b-11: 'jig pa dang skye ba ni sdig pa dang bsod
T02D1921:311b-12: nams kyi sbyor ba yin na de dag dngos po
T02D1921:311b-13: med pa las / ci'i phyir de dag gi rang bzhin 'byung zhes pa'o //
T02D1921:311b-14: byang chub kyi sems zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1921:311b-15: de gsal ba ni gtan la 'bebs pa'o //
T02D1921:311b-16: de ston par byed pa dag gi tshogs te byang chub kyi sems gsal bar byed pa'i le'u'o //
T02D1921:311b-17: le'u bcu bdun pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1921:311b-19: // / rgyud 'byung ba'i skabs la babs pa'i don gsungs pa /
T02D1921:311b-20: de nas gtam rgyud brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1921:311b-21: lhags te zhes bya ba ni mngon par phyogs par gyur pa'o //
T02D1921:311b-22: bdud chen po las rgyal ba zhes bya ba la
T02D1921:311b-23: bdud chen po ni nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1921:311b-25: pha rol las rgyal bas rgyal ba ste mngon par
T02D1921:311b-26: byang chub pa rnam pa lnga las yang dag par
T02D1921:311b-27: byung ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa gshin rje gshed kyi
T02D1921:311b-29: nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i gtso bo zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed kyi khro bo'o //
T02D1921:311b-30: des par phyung bar gyur nas zhes bya ba ni
T02D1921:311b-31: sku gsung thugs rnams kyis gshin rje gshed du 'gyur
T02D1921:311b-32: ba'o // dgos pa bstan pa'i don du nges par phyung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:311b-33: de rnams kyang de'i dus su gnas pa'i lha la
T02D1921:311b-34: sogs pa rnams la de bzhin du snang ba yin
T02D1921:311b-35: pas 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
T02D1921:311b-36: bcom ldan 'das rang nyid kyis bdag nyid kyi bdag nyid la bka' bsgo ba yang ma yin no //
T02D1921:311b-37: skad cig la zhes pa ni dus su nyung ngu nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1921:311b-38: legs par rab tu yid la byas so zhes bya ba ni bdud rnams so zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1921:311b-39: legs so sbyin pa dang ldan pa gang yin zhe na /
T02D1921:312a-0: @312a * // legs par byed pa ni gang rab tu byed pa ni gang zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1921:312a-1: gsang ba chen po'i bdag po zhes bya ba la gsang ba chen po ni gnod sbyin no //
T02D1921:312a-2: de rnams kyi bdag po ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02D1921:312a-3: rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes bya ba ni
T02D1921:312a-4: mi bskyod pa'i rigs te 'dir de'i rigs mchog tu
T02D1921:312a-5: gyur pas na de'i dbang du byas pa'i shes pa'o
T02D1921:312a-6: // ci rgyud 'di gtso bo yin pa'am /
T02D1921:312a-7: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud bzhin du yang dag par phyung ba yin zhe na /
T02D1921:312a-9: na da ku be ra yi yab /
T02D1921:312a-10: ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1921:312a-11: na da ku be ra zhes pa'i rgyud rkang pa
T02D1921:312a-12: gcig dang bcas pa'i 'bum phrag gcig pa las phyung
T02D1921:312a-14: nan tan du byas zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i
T02D1921:312a-15: nan tan gyis te des 'dul ba'i blo dang ldan
T02D1921:312a-17: de bzhin du rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes
T02D1921:312a-18: bya ba la sogs pa ni rgyud kyi rgyal po
T02D1921:312a-19: las so // aoodya na nas byung zhes pa ni aoodya na nas yang dag par byung ba'o //
T02D1921:312a-20: le'u bco brgyad pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1921:312a-22: // / gang gis rgya mtsho'i chu yang rmig pas 'gebs shing ri bo 'ang rab tu g-yo ba yi //
T02D1921:312a-23: ma he'i rgyab tu nyi ma dmar po'i gnas su gang zhig zhon zhing rol pa ni //
T02D1921:312a-24: bskal pa'i mthar byung sprin dang 'dra ba'i gshin rje gshed kyi rnam pas yun rings su //
T02D1921:312a-25: 'gro ba rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa rab tu
T02D1921:312a-26: 'byor pa'i rgyur gyur cig / bde gshegs dgongs pa
T02D1921:312a-27: yongs su shes pa'i stobs ni rin chen te //
T02D1921:312a-28: srid gsum mun pa 'joms shing dga' bas 'di ni phreng ba'ang yin //
T02D1921:312a-29: rin chen 'od zer ldan pas snying la gnas pa'i yon tan byed //
T02D1921:312a-30: mdog bzang phreng bar brgyus pa'i yon tan ldan pa 'di yis ni //
T02D1921:312a-31: snod kyi sems can rtag tu sems nyid dga' zhing rgyas pa dang //
T02D1921:312a-32: shin tu dga' ba'i yid kyis mun pa sel bas nyi ma bzhin //
T02D1921:312a-33: rin chen dang ni 'dra bas rin chen phreng ba ste //
T02D1921:312a-34: yang dag bsdus pas 'gro ba las ni rgyal ba'o //
T02D1921:312a-35: de yi gnyis med rtogs pa'i las ni mtshungs med pa'i //
T02D1921:312a-36: snying rje dang ni stong pa'i brtse bas snod du gyur //
T02D1921:312b-0: sems can kun gyi snod @312b rnams las ni bde gshegs kyi //
T02D1921:312b-1: dgongs pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu yis bran pa'i brtse chen po //
T02D1921:312b-2: kun mkhyen yang dag sems ni rgya mtsho'i chu rlabs bzhin //
T02D1921:312b-3: rgyal ba gshin rje gshed dpal rnam spras nan tan las //
T02D1921:312b-4: yon tan dpal du gyur pa'i dka' 'grol 'di yin te //
T02D1921:312b-5: rin chen phreng ba zhes ni ming du brjod pa'o //
T02D1921:312b-6: ma gha'a yi shar gyi phyogs //
T02D1921:312b-7: bham ga la zhes bya ba'i yul //
T02D1921:312b-8: bi kram pu ri'i gtsug lag khang //
T02D1921:312b-9: sku 'khrungs mkhas pa chen po las //
T02D1921:312b-10: aa wa dh'u t'i par gyur pa'i //
T02D1921:312b-11: gzhon nu zla bas mdzad pa yin //
T02D1921:312b-12: rgya gar mkhan po li la badzra la //
T02D1921:312b-13: bod kyi lo ts'a bsod nams rgyal mtshan ni //
T02D1921:312b-14: rus pa dpyal la mtshan ni ser tsa yis //
T02D1921:312b-15: rnyed dang grags pa'i don du 'di ma bsgyur //
T02D1921:312b-16: rang gi slob ma rnams kyis gsol btab nas //
T02D1921:312b-17: phan pa'i bsams pas 'di don legs par bsgyur //
T02D1921:312b-18: gal te lhag chad 'ga' zhig yod srid na //
T02D1921:312b-19: rgya dpe gzhan dang mkhas pa gzhan dag la //
T02D1921:312b-20: da dung bdag nyid zhus gtugs legs par bgyid //
T02D1921:312b-21: sgra yi ming dang rnam rtog sna tshogs pas //
T02D1921:312b-22: lo ts'a gzhan gyis bcos pa ma mdzad cig / mnyan zhing shes na 'di la bshad pa mdzod //
T02D1921:312b-23: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba /
